name: Lilla Nostalgispegeln
description:
Fick du aldrig vinna ryggsäcken, bollen eller cykeln? Nu har du chansen igen!

I Lilla Nostalgi-Spegeln får alla så många bollar man behöver. Men klarar du pricka hålen?

*WIP*-list (what comes next in dev): 

Ball can only be dropped not thrown. Work with throwing-physics.

Winning celebration video won't play on TV. Fix collider trigger and video surface.

Bouncy physics won't work as supposed in build but is ok in unity.

Animations for winning to be created.

Immersive sound-design to be created.
